summary: MULTIPLE TIMES WHILE DRIVING MY 2001 CHEVY SUBURBAN AND COMING TO A STOP, AT SLOW SPEEDS, MY ABS BRAKES COME ON.  IT USUALLY OCCURS AT APPROX. 3MPH.  I HAVE TRIED REPLACING MY BRAKE PADS, MY ABS COMPUTER AND A SENSOR.  NONE OF THESE ACTIONS HAVE RESOLVED THE PROBLEM.  THE NUMBER OF TIMES IT HAS OCCURRED ARE TOO NUMEROUS TO COUNT.  I ALSO HAVE TWO FRIENDS WITH IDENTICAL PROBLEMS IN SIMILAR GM VEHICLES.  TO DATE I HAVE SPENT OVER $1000 ON THE PROBLEM.
